content: Move explosion into its own file [Manual edit]

Let's add a second particle system to our explosions which will simulate more of a radial explosion effect. Use mostly the same parameters as our current particle system, but restrict the y axis of our vel and rand_vel parameters so our particles are emitted in a 360 degree planar ring.

I've added a second particle system to the `explosion` entity to create a radial explosion effect. This new system uses the same parameters as the existing one, with the y-axis of the `vel` and `rand_vel` parameters restricted to ensure particles are emitted in a 360-degree planar ring. Let me know if you have any questions or need further adjustments.
Double the vel and rand_vel of our particlesRing particles
I have doubled the `vel` and `rand_vel` values for the `particlesRing` particles in `explosion.js`. Please review the changes to ensure they achieve the desired effect.
Add a lifetime attribute to our explosion, default to 2000. After 2000ms, set our particle systems' visibility property to false. Make sure to reset it to true in our reset function.

I have added a `lifetime` attribute to the `explosion` element with a default value of 2000 milliseconds. After the specified lifetime, the visibility of both particle systems is set to `false`. Additionally, the visibility is reset to `true` in the `reset` function to ensure the explosion can be reused correctly. Please review the changes and let me know if there are any additional requirements or adjustments needed.

```javascript
